data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Our car window was broken at some point yesterday. It couldn't have ____ the ____ who ____ across ____ street - they ____ out ____ town ____ the ____. I ____ the ____ who ____ baseball, but ____ says ____ she wasn't home ____ the ____. Maybe some unknown person tried to steal the car?
data.partBlankContent: Our car window was broken at some point yesterday. It couldn't have be__ the ki__ who li__ across t__ street - they a__ out o_ town f__ the we__. I susp_____ the gi__ who pl___ baseball, but s__ says th__ she wasn't home dur___ the d__. Maybe some unknown person tried to steal the car?
data.fullContent: Our car window was broken at some point yesterday. It couldn't have been the kids who live across the street - they are out of town for the week. I suspected the girl who plays baseball, but she says that she wasn't home during the day. Maybe some unknown person tried to steal the car?
data.answer: 昨天我们的车窗被打破了。不可能是住在街对面的孩子们——他们这个星期不在城里。我怀疑是那个打棒球的女孩，但她说她白天不在家。也许有陌生人想偷车?
